metadata.title: CVE-2024-42327 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: A non-admin user account on the Zabbix frontend with the default User role,or with any other role that gives API access can exploit thisvulnerability. An SQLi exists in the CUser class in the addRelatedObjectsfunction, this function is being called from the CUser.get function whichis available for every user who has API access.

criterions.comment: zabbix package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
